name: Urban Classic Hoodie
description: Stay warm and stylish with the Urban Classic Hoodie. Crafted from high-quality materials, this hoodie is perfect for everyday wear and features a modern fit that complements any casual look.

name: Maverick Flex Hoodie
description: The Maverick Flex Hoodie offers unparalleled comfort and flexibility. Designed for active individuals, it features a lightweight, breathable fabric that moves with you, making it ideal for workouts or casual outings.

name: Breezy Style Summer Shorts
description: Embrace the summer vibes with our Breezy Style Summer Shorts. These shorts are perfect for warm weather, offering a comfortable fit and breathable fabric to keep you cool all day long.

name: Comfy Fit High-Waist Leggings
description: Experience the ultimate comfort and support with our Comfy Fit High-Waist Leggings. Perfect for workouts or casual wear, these leggings offer a flattering high-waist design and are made from a stretchy, durable fabric.

name: Little Explorers T-shirt
description: Let your kids explore the world in style with the Little Explorers T-shirt. Made from soft, breathable fabric, this t-shirt is designed for comfort and durability, perfect for everyday adventures.

name: Exclusive Sable Legacy T-shirt
description: Make a statement with the Exclusive Sable Legacy T-shirt. Featuring a unique design and crafted from premium materials, this t-shirt is perfect for those who want to stand out from the crowd.

name: Urban Rebel Bomber Jacket
description: Add an edge to your wardrobe with the Urban Rebel Bomber Jacket. Designed for the bold and fearless, this jacket features a sleek, modern fit and is made from high-quality materials for durability and style.

name: Classic Style Graphic T-shirt
description: Embrace timeless style with the Classic Style Graphic T-shirt. This t-shirt features a classic fit and a stylish graphic design, perfect for any casual occasion. Made from high-quality materials for lasting comfort.
